version.fix: Existance of a try() function in the ErrorHandler was throwing parse errors on Win32 systems().
Services weren't starting because of case problems with the get_class() functions in PHP5.

version.change: Authentication now plays nicely with GET parameters and maintains them around during the authentication sequence.
Agent searching works with new mapping system.

New Framework/Architecture-GUI/Theme interaction decouples the Harmoni object from the output system. The GUIManager and other OutputHandlers extend the OutputHandler abstract class and can be attached to Harmoni. A default 'BasicOutputHandler' is used when no other OutputHandler is specified.

Services::startService(), Services::stopService(), Services::restartService(), and Services::startAll() are now deprecated and print warnings if used. Please use Services::startManagerAsService() and/or Services::getService() instead.

'Service' classes no longer extend the services interface or use start()/stop() methods. These had been designed into Harmoni, but were never used and are now removed. start()/stop() methods will NOT be called during service starting/stopping.
OKI version 1 interfaces and implementations have been removed, saving 2MB of files and cleaning up the source tree.

The hierarchy's Tree class, HierarchyManager/tree/Tree.class.php, now caches its traversal results. (Savings: 93,529 calls to tree->_traverse(), 43 seconds execution time on a 500MHz PC in a 5000-node hierarchy)
version.new: ValidatorRule objects can now be accessed via static XxxxxValidatorRule::getRule() methods, allowing the ValidatorRule classes to behave as Singletons and avoid the instantiation of tens of thousands of ValidatorRule objects.
GUI Manager now complete. ThemeHandler and LayoutHandler have been removed.
GUI Manager saving functionality.
OsidManagers can now be started and configured by Services::startManagerAsService("name", $context, $configuration);
Service names can now have aliases.
version.change: Authentication is completely handled by the AuthenticationManager OSID implementation instead of the LoginHandler/AuthenticationHandler. The LoginHandler and AuthenticationHandler have been removed.
version.new: New back-end for managing authentication tokens, agents, and the mappings between agents and authentication tokens. This is all contained within the core/oki2/agentmanagement/ directory.
version.change: DBHandler now provides methods for transaction handling. Applications can be coded to use transactions to ensure atomic writes. Databases that do not support transactions will simply ignore the calls. Nested transaction calls in MySQL are interperated so that only the outer transaction is run allowing applications coded to use nested transactions to often operate on MySQL 4.0.11+.
version.new: Now includes implementations of v2.0 of the O.K.I OSIDs.
Now includes v2.0 of the O.K.I OSIDs.
version.change: AuthorizationManager now properly returns implicit AZ corresponding to explicit AZs at a parent instead of returning the explict AZs themselves.
DataManager: added function to SchemaManager to generate valid PHP code for a given Schema.
DataManager: deleting a value from a Record without version control now actually deletes the value instead of flagging it as inactive.

The LanguageLocalizer now defines functions for _() and gettext() that simply return the passed string, so that localized apps can fail gracefully to their native language if gettext is not installed.
DBHandler improvements: SQL strings are prettier now. Also added variable binding functionallity.

version.new: Added a "MIME" service for sniffing mime types from file extensions.

Added an ImageProcessor service for the resizing of images, generation of thumbnails, and other common image processing functions. This service can be configured to use multiple modules to handle different file types, as availible. An example would be using PHP's GD libraries for handling jpegs and pngs, while using ImageMagick (via shell_exec()) for tiff, psd, pdf, etc. files.
version.fix: DBHandler: PostgreSQL now functions without throwing invalid errors.
version.new: Digital Repository: Now has a "File" Info structure system for storing binary files.
version.change: Digital Repository: Now stores Asset dates outside of the the data manager.
version.new: Harmoni::addPreExecActions($action,...) adds a number of actions to execute before executing the action requested by the end user.
Harmoni::addPostExecActions($action,...) adds a number of actions to execute after executing the action requested by the end user.
Harmoni::executeLogin() executes the LoginHandler and stores the result to avoid discrepancies.
version.change: Migrated OKI DR implementation to use new DataManager.

DataManager: Records now dynamically update their fetch-mode (how much & what data has been fetched) depending on the operation to be performed. Previous version required one to manually re-fetch records (annoying).
version.new: Function printDebugBacktrace([$traceArray]) will print out a debug_backtrace() in a pretty way.
DataManager: Record::getValuesArray() returns an associative array of all active values in a Record.
DateTime::toString() now has optional parameter to return a shorter M/D/Y for the date instead of Month DD, YYYY.
version.fix: AuthN queries now have slashes added to dbc query values.
Shared queries now have slashes added to query values.
Globally added addslashes() calls to quoted values in query strings.
version.change: Fixed LoginHandler problem which was preventing the use of custom callback functions.
version.new: A new "Sets" service provides an easy system for the creation, ordering, and maintaining of persistant collections of Ids.
Added new system for storing primitive data values in objects (all classes implementing the Primitive interface - see harmoni/core/dataManager/primitives)
Re-worked the DataManager with simpler class names and more flexibility. (see harmoni/core/dataManager)
Added a "revision" to all DataSetTypeDefinitions for later program upgrades (can check revision number to see if the structure is up-to-date instead of comparing every field).
GUIManager service, based around CSS, will eventually replace the theme/layout handlers.
Implemented the Authorization OSID.
version.change: Reworked the Hierarchy implementation to use a better data-fetching/caching model.

version.new: Added a new OKI-Hiearchy implementation (hierarchy2).
DataManager: added a datatype to store OKI-style types.
version.change: LanguageLocalizer reworked for easier usage and caching of language preferences.
The DataManager/metaData now uses the OKI Shared Ids instead of its own internal id system. This keeps all access to unique ids safely behind the Shared interface.
Themes and layouts have been completely re-worked to support easier use and more user control of the themes.
Argument Validator now dosn't fail on string representations of integers; i.e. "100" as well as 100 will validate.
version.new: Implimented the Digital Repository OSID in Harmoni. The DR uses the Hierarchy OSID, the DataManager, and the Shared OSID to provide for high-level access and browsing of Assets and their associated data/metadata.
version.change: Services: The Harmoni Services now check for the Error Handler and use that to print out errors if it is availible. This makes for easier to read backtraces.
DBHandler: DBHandler now throws fatal errors with an explanation when a query fails.
version.new: Hierarchy: Implimented the Hierarchy OSID. The Hiearchy supports the storing of multiple hierarchies and their nodes in one database. In the current implimentation, the entire hierarchy is pulled from the database each load. This needs to be re-written to optimize it for fast reads from 100,000+ node hierarchy (current Segue at Middlebury has ~50,000 nodes).
DataManager: added DataSet caching to the DataSetManager. Added support for required fields in DataSetTypeDefinitions.
version.change: Removed argument validation from DateTime constructor to speed up code by 33%.
DataManager: sped up fetching large numbers of DataSets at once (by a factor of two).
DataManager: DataSet::prune() now takes a required VersionConstraint object on which to base the pruning process. Handling of pruning Tags is very very messy, but it works.
version.new: DataManager: can use DataSetManager::selectIDsBySearch() to search all/some DataSets and return a list of DataSets that match the criteria.
version.change: DataManager: ValueVersion::prune() now deletes itself if the DataSet it is part of is inactive.
DataManager: DataSet::prune() now removes all Tags associated with itself.
Implementation of the OKI SharedManager (HarmoniSharedManager) now uses the HarmoniDataManager's IDManager for ID creation.
version.new: Optional third argument to DataSetManager::fetchArrayOfIDs() specifies an array of DataSetTypes to limit the query.
Completed the HarmoniDataManager!
version.change: HarmoniDataManager::setup($dbID) now takes optional second argument including a list of DataSetTypes to preload in a single query to save time and Database overhead.
version.new: added FloatDataType, ShortStringDataType. finished up DataManager tagging, cloning, pruning functionality.
added BooleanDataType to DataManager.
DataSetManager::fetchArrayOfIDs() fetches an array of DataSet ids in one SQL query.
DateTime::compare(date1, date2) returns difference in seconds between two dates.
version.fix: Typo in constructor for UnknownDBError class.
version.new: Harmoni::forward(module,action) is now a synonym for Harmoni::ActionHandler::forward() for convenience.
Classes: Timer and QueryCounter for easy micro-second timing or DB query counting, respectively.
version.change: Harmoni::getData has been deprecated and replaced by Harmoni::getAttachedData to avoid ambiguity.
IDManager::newID() now uses auto_increment DB functionality to reduce query count on compatible servers.
version.fix: DataSet::populate() now sets its own ID to avoid super re-duplication of DataSets in database.
DateTime::now() now gives correct Hour value. Likewise MySQLDatabase::toDBDate() now adds 1 to hour value to give correct 1-24 value. Other DB Types haven't yet been checked.
version.change: Modified field in HarmoniDataManager table "datasetfield" from "datasetfield_created" to "datasetfield_modified" since it is updated on every commit().
version.new: Extensive work on DataManager. Now works for creating/retrieving datasets with version controls.
version.fix: Corrected ArgumentValidator call in DBHandler checking for DateTimeInterface instead of DateTime.
version.new: Added AgentInformationHandler::agentExists($name, [$method]) which steps through each AuthenticationMethod and checks for an existing agent.
version.change: LoginState now has better support for Active/Authenticated agents. It should allow one to change the active agent without disturbing the actual authentication process.

version.new: DateTime class has two new functions: toString() and toMDY() which display a full date/time and a MM/DD/YY string, respectfully.
Harmoni::pathInfoParts now contains an array of PATH_INFO elements.
ErrorHandler has new method getErrorQueue() which returns the error queue in a Queue object.
version.change: Harmoni::attachContextData() has been renamed (again) to Harmoni::attachData(). Context::getData() has been moved to Harmoni::getData().
Context object now carries an array holding the executed actions path, available by referencing Context::actionPath.

ActionHander and Harmoni: ActionHandler now only passes a reference to the Harmoni object to action functions and scripts. Other variables are available here: Harmoni::HTTPVars, Harmoni::Context, Harmoni::LoginState.
Removed many .interface.php files to save on load times and unnecessary flexibility.

LoginHandler no longer throws a default error on login failure. LoginHandler::setFailedLoginError() can be used to specify an error to be thrown to the UserError service. This change is primarily so that people using different languages won't be locked into using English for this error message (a pretty important one).
LoginState::attachData() has been moved to Harmoni::attachContextData() and LoginState::getData() has been moved to Context::getData() for logical and organizational reasons.

LoginHandler and Harmoni: when LoginHandler is used, the action that is checked for required authentication is now the LAST action executed instead of the first. This way, the action that finally ends up being executed is the "authoritative" action.
Made ActionHandler check for class and method definitions before trying to execute them.
version.new: Added defines in config/services.cfg.php to allow a choice of which major "modules" of Harmoni to load, in order to save on startup time.
version.fix: Numerous bug fixes in Harmoni, ActionHandler, LoginHandler
version.new: Added a file under core/version.inc.php which holds the current harmoni versions.
Implemented IDManager class under metaData/ to handle ID generation for the MetaData handler classes.
version.change: Updated HarmoniType OSID implementation to have a constructor that follows OKI's specifications.
version.new: Services class now outputs a debug backtrace upon error.
version.fix: Fixed bug in optional arg-list for Services::startService that caused a syntax error in eval().
version.change: Services class method startService($name) now takes optional additional arguments which are passed to the service class constructor.
version.new: FormFieldSet class under 'utilities' combines FieldSet functionality with keeping track of changed values and easy validation. Intended for HTML Form use.
version.change: Various fixes to the OSIDs. Added 'requires' for classes being extended. Fixed syntax errors.
version.new: Laid out a skeleton Shared Service implimentation. Currently the shared manager only provides for the generation of unique IDs using a databse.
Fully implimented the Hierarchy Service, the first of the OKI OSIDs to be implimented. The Hierarchy Service supports saving to a database as well as memory-only usage.
Harmoni Users's Guide stored locally in XML format. Wrote a gen-script in PHP using domxml to make pretty HTML interface.
version.change: LanguageLocalizer now uses gettext() functions instead of home-brewed. Included PO generators, "borrowed" from the Horde project (www.horde.org).
New OKI interfaces, OKI gen-scripts and token files added (under harmoni/oki and harmoni/core/tools/oki respectively)

version.new: ActionHandler::forward($action) can now be called from within an action to continue execution.
Services::registerObjectAsService() allows you to register an already-instantiated object as a service.
version.change: Services::requireService() now returns the started service.
LanguageLocalizer files can now have comments (designated by '#') and keys/values are trimmed.
Harmoni->execute() now returns the result from the action if outputHTML = false.
DebugHandlers now store an internal output level which is used when none is passed to the Printer.
LoginState now keeps track of both an Active and Logged-in agent.
Layouts & other VisualComponents now have setLevel() and getLevel() methods and store the level locally.
Template->output() now accepts a variable length argument list of FieldSets or hash tables.
Actions are now passed a reference to the Harmoni object.
version.new: Databases now have a toDBDate() and fromDBDate() function to convert to the necessary Date format.
Completed ActionHandler, LoginHandler and Harmoni classes and services.
version.change:
Deprecated the createDatabase() method in DBHandler. Use addDatabase(), instead. This change was provoked by the fact that
Oracle requires different arguments to instantiate the DB object.
version.new: Added RGBcolor and HTMLcolor classes.
version.change: Finished Layout, Theme and Template.
AuthenticationMethod includes changed to avoid random unprintable character output.
FieldSetValidator and RuleSet now take optional argument on validate()/validateAll() functions specifying if errors should be thrown upon failure or not.
RuleSet can now accept an ErrorHandler to use via setErrorHandler().
version.new: DBHandler can now use a PostgreSQL server and fetching last insert ID works on all integrated DBs.
version.change: layoutHandler now works. Theme integration is to come.
version.new: Database file storage method.
Added interfaces for: VisualComponent, Layout, Menu, Content -- all part of the LayoutHandler.
version.change: AuthenticationResult now holds authenticated agent's system name as well as valid methods.
AgentInformationHandler now handles compiling of search results and returns the appropriate array format.
AuthenticationMethod::getAgentInformation now returns an associative array of [username]=>array([key1]=>value1,...),...
version.new: ChangeLog now held in an XML file and translated by XSL!

version.change: Changed AuthenticationMethod to allow for getAgentInformation(username,searchMode) so that one can search for a username/fullname etc as well as get information for a single entry.
version.new: Added StatisticsHandler.
version.change: Updated DB and LDAP AuthenticationMethods to allow for user-info searching & tested backwards compatibility.
Changed naming scheme of packages so that they describe more clearly what they DO as opposed to what they CONTAIN.
